attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are men and women risking their lives daily for this country in Iraq and Afghanistan.  The greatest morale booster that these brave men and women can receive is regular and speedy contact with thier families.  Equally, the greatest comfort that the families can receive is regular personal contact with their husbands, wives, sons, daughters and any other relative serving in Iraq and Afghanistan. Full free postage and communication for these families is a price our grateful nation should be prepared to pay. With thanks to everyone who has supported this campaign from Maria Dodsworth and Mr David Cain
